resources.string: This app is the video catalogue of NPTEL course "Joy of Computing using Python". This app has been made solely because of the fact that the website is too slow to load and takes and eternity to navigate through. App made by kauStubh.
The data of this app appears to be corrupted. Press OK to fix the issue and restart the app. Keep your INTERNET connection turned ON, otherwise it would not be able to fix itself.
